Room.Name: Nagaritha Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Nagaritha Drive, north of the Corn Fields.
Room.LongDescription: The rolling corn fields on the south side of the road provide food for most of the residents of Oceancrest. Mr. DeNail owns and operates the large complex, and is always willing to hire on some unskilled labor to work the fields and scare off the crows and other pests that plague the corn fields.
